Hi,

We make use of the tag system, unfortunally there is no way to sort them directly.
We are using them in an imap folder everything is fine but we have more than 20 tags and a way to sort them form 1-9 will be a step forward. (yes we tried it with adding numbers in front of it but a lot of people have to change them periodical!)

in my oppinon the tag system should ba able to assign keybindings 1-9 ALT+1-9 or whatever is free for the client. this would make it more useful.

thanks.

Reproducible: Always
